sys_script_include.name: pinnacle_info

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.pinnacle_info</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>pinnacle_info</name><script><![CDATA[var pinnacle_info = Class.create();
pinnacle_info.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
	
	acctInfo : function() {
	
var arr = [];
var getInfo=this.getParameter('sysparm_visio_365_kfs_account_number'); //Value Fetched from client script

var gr=new GlideRecord('x_58872_needit_kfs_pinnacle');
   gr.addQuery('sys_id',getInfo);
gr.query();

while(gr.next())
{
arr.push(gr.ACCOUNT_NAME);
arr.push(gr.ORG_CD);
}


   //gs.addInfoMessage(arr);
return arr.toString();

    },
	
    type: 'pinnacle_info'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-15 20:43:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>b39c68d02f3859108968ea5ef699b6f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>pinnacle_info</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b39c68d02f3859108968ea5ef699b6f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-15 20:44:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
